verses.verse: It happened on the eighth<WH8066> day,<WH3117> that Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> Aaron<WH175> and his sons,<WH1121> and the elders<WH2205> of Israel;<WH3478>

and he said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> "Take<WH3947> a<WH1241> calf<WH5695> from the herd for a sin offering,<WH2403> and a ram<WH352> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> without blemish,<WH8549> and offer<WH7126> them before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>

You shall speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> <WH3947> 'Take a male<WH8163> goat<WH5795> for a sin offering;<WH2403> and a calf<WH5695> and a lamb,<WH3532> both a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old,<WH8549> without blemish, for a burnt offering;<WH5930>

and a bull<WH7794> and a ram<WH352> for peace offerings,<WH8002> to sacrifice<WH2076> before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068> and a meal offering<WH4503> mixed<WH1101> with oil:<WH8081> for today<WH3117> Yahweh<WH3068> appears to you.<WH7200>'"

They brought<WH3947> what Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> before<WH6440> the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150> and all the congregation<WH4150> drew near<WH7126> and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> "This is the thing<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> that you should do:<WH6213> and the glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> shall appear to you.<WH7200>"

Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> "Draw<WH7126> near to the altar,<WH4196> and offer<WH6213> your sin offering,<WH2403> and your burnt offering,<WH5930> and make atonement<WH3722> for yourself,<WH5971> and for the people; and offer<WH6213> the offering<WH7133> of the people,<WH5971> and make atonement<WH3722> for them;<WH3068> as Yahweh commanded.<WH6680>"
So Aaron<WH175> drew near to the altar,<WH4196> and killed<WH7819> the calf<WH5695> of the sin offering,<WH2403> which was for himself.

The sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> presented<WH7126> the blood<WH1818> to him;<WH2881> and he dipped his finger<WH676> in the blood,<WH1818> and put<WH5414> it on the horns<WH7161> of the altar,<WH4196> and poured<WH3332> out the blood<WH1818> at the base<WH3247> of the altar:<WH4196>

but the fat,<WH2459> and the kidneys,<WH3629> and the cover<WH3508> from<WH4480> the liver<WH3516> of the sin offering,<WH2403> he burned<WH6999> upon the altar;<WH4196> as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
The flesh<WH1320> and the skin<WH5785> he burned<WH8313> with fire<WH784> outside<WH2351> the camp.<WH4264>
He killed<WH7819> the burnt offering;<WH5930> and Aaron<WH175>'s sons<WH1121> delivered<WH4672> the blood<WH1818> to him,<WH2236> and he sprinkled it around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>
They delivered<WH4672> the burnt offering<WH5930> to him,<WH5409> piece by piece, and the head:<WH7218> and he burned<WH6999> them upon the altar.<WH4196>
He washed<WH7364> the innards<WH7130> and the legs,<WH3767> and burned<WH6999> them on the burnt offering<WH5930> on the altar.<WH4196>

He presented<WH7126> the people<WH5971>'s offering,<WH7133> and took<WH3947> the goat<WH8163> of the sin offering<WH2403> which was for the people,<WH5971> and killed<WH7819> it,<WH2398> and offered it for sin, like the first.<WH7223>
He presented<WH7126> the burnt offering,<WH5930> and offered<WH6213> it according to the ordinance.<WH4941>

He presented<WH7126> the meal offering,<WH4503> and filled<WH4390> his hand<WH3709> from there,<WH6999> and burned it upon the altar,<WH4196> besides<WH905> the burnt offering<WH5930> of the morning.<WH1242>

He also killed<WH7819> the bull<WH7794> and the ram,<WH352> the sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings,<WH8002> which was for the people:<WH5971> and Aaron<WH175>'s sons<WH1121> delivered<WH4672> to him the blood,<WH1818> which he sprinkled<WH2236> around<WH5439> on the altar,<WH4196>
and the fat<WH2459> of the bull<WH7794> and of the ram,<WH352> the fat tail,<WH451> and that which covers<WH4374> the innards,<WH3629> and the kidneys, and the cover<WH3508> of the liver:<WH3516>
and they put<WH7760> the fat<WH2459> upon the breasts,<WH2373> and he burned<WH6999> the fat<WH2459> on the altar:<WH4196>
and the breasts<WH2373> and the right<WH3225> thigh<WH7785> Aaron<WH175> waved<WH5130> for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> as Moses<WH4872> commanded.<WH6680>

Aaron<WH175> lifted up<WH5375> his hands<WH3027> toward the people,<WH5971> and blessed<WH1288> them;<WH3381> and he came down from offering<WH6213> the sin offering,<WH2403> and the burnt offering,<WH2403> and the peace offerings.<WH8002>

Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> went<WH935> into the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> and came out,<WH3318> and blessed<WH1288> the people:<WH5971> and the glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> to all the people.<WH5971>

There came<WH3318> forth fire<WH784> from before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> and consumed<WH398> the burnt offering<WH5930> and the fat<WH2459> upon the altar:<WH4196> and when all the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> it,<WH7442> they shouted, and fell<WH5307> on their faces.<WH6440>
